data.title: Read the Label Brochures - Chinese, traditional
data.meta_description: information about the importance of keeping pesticides in their original container, how to prevent harm to the environment, and why you should buy the right product in the right amount for your needs
data.text:
These brochures includes information about the importance of keeping pesticides in their original container, how to prevent harm to the environment, and why you should buy the right product in the right amount for your needs.

Read the Label First - Garden (pdf)

Read the Label First - Household (pdf)

Read the Label First - Kids (pdf)

Read the Label First - Pets (pdf)
